reference.title: Product Name Standard Document
reference.organization: Fleet Numerical Meteorology and Oceanography Center

reference.title: GRIB 2
reference.infoUsed: GRIB2 Category of parameters by Product Discipline, table 4.1

category.name: Temperature
category.description: Includes temperature, dew point, lapse rate, potential temperatures, etc

category.name: Moisture
category.description: Includes humidities, mixing ratio, vapor pressure, precipitation, etc

category.name: Momentum
category.description: Includes wind speed and direction, stream functions, momentum flux, vorticity, divergence, etc

category.name: Mass
category.description: Includes pressure, geopotential, altitudes, density, heights, etc

category.name: Short wave radiation
category.description: Includes short wave radiation, brightness temperature, radiance, etc

category.name: Long wave radiation
category.description: Includes infrared fluxes.

category.name: Cloud
category.description: Includes cloud cover, cloud base, cloud top, ceiling, etc.

category.name: Thermodynamic Stability Indices
category.description: Includes lifted indices, K index, inhibition, helicity, etc.

category.name: Moisture Probabilities
category.description: Includes ice and precipation probabilities.

category.name: Momentum Probabilities
category.description: Includes wind frequencies etc.

category.name: Aerosols
category.description: Includes concentration, source, slant path, type, etc.

category.name: Trace gases
category.description: Includes Ozone and CO2.

category.name: Radar
category.description: Includes spectrum width, reflectivity, precipation, etc.

category.name: Forecast radar imagery
category.description: Includes reflectivity factors, reflectivity, echo top, etc.

category.name: Nuclear/radiology
category.description: Includes concentrations, ground depositions, etc.

category.name: Physical atmospheric properties
category.description: Includes visibility, albedo, mixed layer depth, icing, turbulence, etc.

category.name: Atmospheric chemical constituents
category.description: Includes asymmetry, extinction, mass density, mass fluxes, mixing ratios, scattering, etc.

category.name: Reserved values 21 to 189
category.description: Reserved for WMO use.

category.name: Reserved values 192 to 254
category.description: Reserved for local use.

category.name: Hydrology Basic Products
category.description: Includes flash flood, snow cover, etc.

category.name: Hydrology Probabilities
category.description: Includes precipitation fractile and probabilities, etc.

category.name: Inland water and sediment properties
category.description: Includes water properties, sediment properties, ice properties, shape factors, etc.

category.name: Reserved values 3 to 191
category.description: Reserved for WMO use.

category.name: Reserved values 192 to 254
category.description: Reserved for local use.

category.name: Vegetation/Biomass
category.description: Includes land cover, surface roughness, etc.

category.name: Soil products
category.description: Includes soil type, moisture, temperature, etc.

category.name: Fire Weather Products
category.description: Includes risk areas, dry lightning areas, etc.

category.name: Reserved values 5 to 191
category.description: Reserved for WMO use.

category.name: Reserved values 192 to 254
category.description: Reserved for local use.

category.name: Image format products
category.description: Includes scaled albedo, scaled brightness temperature, cloud mask, fire detection indicator, etc.

category.name: Quantitative products
category.description: Includes estimated precipitation, estimated wind u/v components, heights, quality indicators, solar zenith angle, etc.

category.name: Reserved values 2 to 191
category.description: Reserved for WMO use.

category.name: Reserved values 192 to 254
category.description: Reserved for local use.

category.name: Temperature
category.description: Includes electron, proton, ion, parallel, perpendicular, etc.

category.name: Momentum
category.description: Includes velocity magnitude, and three vector components, etc.

category.name: Charged particle mass and number
category.description: Includes densities, absoprtion, absorption frequency, scintillation, etc.

category.name: Electric and magnetic fields
category.description: Includes field magnitude, three vector field components, etc.

category.name: Energetic particles
category.description: Includes fluxes for proton/electron/heavy ion/cosmic ray neutron, etc.

category.name: Waves
category.description: none

category.name: Solar electomagnetic emissions
category.description: Includes irradiance, x-ray flux, radio emissions, etc.

category.name: Terrestrial electomagnetic emissions
category.description: Includes limb intensity, disk intensity, etc.

category.name: Imagery
category.description: Includes radiances for x-ray, EUV, H-alpha, white light, CaII-K, and more; thematic mask, etc.

category.name: Ion-neutral coupling
category.description: Includes conductivities of Pedersen, Hall, and Parallel; etc.

category.name: Reserved values 10 to 191
category.description: Reserved for WMO use.

category.name: Reserved values 192 to 254
category.description: Reserved for local use.

category.name: Waves
category.description: Includes spectra, heights, direction, primary, etc.

category.name: Currents
category.description: Includes direction, speed, etc.

category.name: Ice
category.description: Includes cover, thickness, drift, growth, divergence, etc.

category.name: Surface properties
category.description: Includes temperature, sea level deviation from mean, etc.

category.name: Sub-surface properties
category.description: Includes thermocline, salinity, etc.

category.name: Reserved values 5 to 190
category.description: Reserved for use by WMO.

category.name: Miscellaneous
category.description: Includes stream functions

category.name: Reserved 192 to 254 for Local Use
category.description: Reserved for use by WMO.

entry.name: Reserved values 192 to 254 for local use
